node.Title: Consul on Amazon ECS 0.5 Supports AWS IAM and Mesh Gateways
node.Description: The latest version of HashiCorp Consul on Amazon ECS adds support for AWS IAM authentication and mesh gateways.

node.Title: New on HCP: Boundary, Waypoint, Drift Detection, and Azure Support
node.Description: HashiCorp Cloud Platform has added several new capabilities, including managed services for HashiCorp Boundary and Waypoint, and Drift Detection for Terraform Cloud.

node.Title: HashiCorp Vault 1.11 Adds Kubernetes Secrets Engine, PKI Updates, and More
node.Description: Vault 1.11 focuses on improving Vault’s core workflows and making key features production-ready.

node.Title: Announcing Launch and Free Public Beta of HCP Boundary
node.Description: HashiCorp Boundary is now available as a managed service on the HashiCorp Cloud Platform in  free public beta to standardize secure remote access to critical infrastructure regardless of where it resides.

node.Title: Consul API Gateway 0.3 Introduces HA Logical Gateways
node.Description: The latest release of the HashiCorp Consul API Gateway allows users to generate multiple instances of a logical gateway — avoiding single points of failure.

node.Title: Consul 1.13 Tech Preview: Cluster Peering
node.Description: Cluster peering in Consul 1.13 offers a whole new model of how Consul handles cross-cluster federation.

node.Title: HCP Consul on Azure to go GA, Plus More Consul News
node.Description: HCP Consul is becoming generally available on Azure, Consul API Gateway version 0.3 is going GA, and Consul 1.13 is due later this year.

node.Title: New HashiCorp Developer Site is Now in Public Beta
node.Description: Our new documentation platform makes it easy to learn from dozens of interactive lab environments, hundreds of tutorials, and thousands of reference docs.

node.Title: Terraform Cloud Adds Drift Detection for Infrastructure Management
node.Description: Drift Detection for Terraform Cloud continuously checks infrastructure state to detect and notify operators of any changes, minimizing risk, downtime, and costs.

node.Title: Announcing the HCP Waypoint Private Beta Program
node.Description: The HCP Waypoint Private Beta Program allows select early adopters to onboard applications and try out HCP Waypoint to develop a proof of concept.

node.Title: The 3 Phases of Infrastructure Automation
node.Description: From adoption to standardization to operating and optimizing at scale, the evolution of infrastructure automation is critical to modern hybrid and multi-cloud environments.
